comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: This reminds me of a famous photo in The Houck Collection of Major Edwin Armstrong in front of the Eiffel Tower in 1918. I believe Armstrong had a hand in setting up this station. He was on loan to the French Army during the war to work on battlefield communications, and was very successful.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Cropped from original Agence Meurisse photo at Bibliotheque Nationale de France's Gallica site, with following caption: "Le poste de télégraphie sans fil de la Tour Eiffel gardé militairement " [The military guard at the Eiffel Tower wireless telegraph station] Pub. Date 1914
